channel.title: My Error? Trying to add a new NPC
channel.description:
client.java:19766: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. note: recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details 1 error. press any key to continue
PLEASE RESPOND ASAP

item.title: My Error? Trying to add a new NPC
item.dc:creator: @d10n d10n
item.description:
@d10n wrote:

fixed it thx rog3r

Read full topic
item.source: My Error? Trying to add a new NPC

item.title: My Error? Trying to add a new NPC
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

dont add it into client.java… go into autospawn.cfg and add it there. it should work.
heres a code of my white knight.

spawn = 19	3044	3514	0	3048	3512	3043	3519	2	white knight

the 19 is the id of the monster
the 3044 and 3514 is the coords where its gonna be.
the 3048 3512 is where its gonna move
the 3043 3519 ^^
then description… white knight.
If its non walking, just put the coords and leave the 3048-3519 0’s.
Remember, spaces dont work when your putting the coords in. so USE TAB!

Read full topic
item.source: My Error? Trying to add a new NPC

Dont Create multiple theads.
